definition: surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: Jarod yanked his mount aside just in time to avoid an agonizing death.
sentences.chinese: 迦洛德猛拉他坐騎跑到一邊才免於痛苦的死去。

sentences.english: Gourard was an astute businessman with a keen eye for publicity.
sentences.chinese: 高洛德是一位精明的商人，對宣傳目光敏銳。
史密斯傑洛德會來這裏？

sentences.english: In 1888, Gouraud sailed for Britain, where he set about establishing a market for the Phonograph.
sentences.chinese: 1888年，高洛德去了英國，着手開拓留聲機市場。

sentences.english: Harold, please make the check out to Acme Piano Company.
sentences.chinese: 哈洛德，請你開張支票給極致鋼琴公司。

sentences.english: Did you see that picture of Smith Jerrod online?
sentences.chinese: 看到史密斯傑洛德的照片沒？

sentences.english: In his youth Harold was an imposing figure.
sentences.chinese: 哈洛德年輕時體格壯碩。
哈洛德百貨公司在哪裏？

sentences.english: Could you tell us about Harrods?
sentences.chinese: 你能給我們說說哈洛德百貨公司嗎？

sentences.english: By the end of the war, Jarod had acquitted himself with honor.
sentences.chinese: 戰爭結束的時候，迦洛德已是榮譽滿身。

sentences.english: The demigods had agreed to fight under Jarod's direction.
sentences.chinese: 塞納留斯同意在迦洛德指揮下作戰。

sentences.english: Harald H was only found because he set off some fireworks to attract attention to himself.
sentences.chinese: 因爲點燃了煙花自行觀賞，海洛德才被人發現。

sentences.english: It was written by a Temple University student named Harvey Brodsky.
sentences.chinese: 布洛德斯基的學生寫的。哈維說他與一位叫格洛里亞？

sentences.english: Charlotte Street is one of Australia's most respected and highly regarded wine brands.
sentences.chinese: 夏洛德是澳大利亞其中一個最備受推崇的葡萄酒品牌。

sentences.english: Betty and Harold have been married for years.
sentences.chinese: 貝蒂和哈洛德已經是已婚的長達數年之久。

definition: Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
Dole (name)/Bob Dole (1923-), US Republican politician, Kansas senator 1969-1996
